title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made, super soft, and comfortable, noting it's not itchy at all.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely lovely!
items.body: My new favorite sweater! The material is so soft and not too thick not to thin either. It looks really expensive and made very well. I am 5’2 140 lbs and the small fits me perfect. Buy it! Read more
items.author: RonnieLady

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy, Stylish, and Perfect for Fall
items.body: I absolutely love this crewneck sweater! The fit is just right, it's oversized without feeling too bulky, and the batwing sleeves give it a nice relaxed look. I love the side slit detail; it makes it easy to tuck in slightly or leave loose depending on your style for the day. The material feels soft and warm without being itchy, which is perfect for fall weather. I’ve worn it casually with jeans and also dressed it up a little for work, and it looks great in both cases. The striped pattern is subtle but adds just enough interest to make it stand out. Honestly, this has quickly become one of my favorite sweaters in my closet. Comfortable, stylish, and versatile! I would absolutely recommend it to anyone looking for a go-to fall pullover! Read more
items.author: Michelle Kim

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality piece and fabulous design with a price point that hits right!
items.body: The color is spot on, the material and overall quality of this piece are fabulous. I am clothes snob and would never have thought to purchase clothes from Amazon but I am so happy with it! The price point is excellent. I can’t tell you how many compliments I’ve received on this sweater. It’s breathable and feels wonderful. It looks hefty and heavy but it wears so well. You can tuck in the front or untucked for versatile options and I ordered a large for a little more room. It fits perfectly into my wardrobe style and can wear it so many ways. Getting another as we speak. Read more
items.author: Nancyd1970

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and thick, nice quality
items.body: Incredibly soft with a good amount of stretch to it. Substantially thick, making to good for colder weather. Love the balloon sleeve that is tight around the wrist. Super flattering, would recommend. Read more
items.author: Lauren

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Adorable
items.body: Love this sweater (bought another) and received many compliments. I wore it on a recent trip and it was super comfortable on the airplane. Perfect weight fabric and a great design. My favorite thing is the sleeve. The long cuff is very feminine on a sporty sweater. Read more
items.author: K. McCoy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater!
items.body: LOVE! This sweater is great quality. Nice material and color just as pictured! Love the fit as well! Read more
items.author: Dina Fortin

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous comfy sweater, improper seam.
items.body: I first ordered this sweater for myself, (5'4" 155) in a size medium. I do not like super oversized sweaters. But especially with the stripes, I felt it looked and felt too large, so I ordered another one in small. The sweater colors and pattern are gorgeous, they remind me of Burberry. The sweater has a good weight to it, it is warm and I like the feel of the fabric. It's soft and kind of stretchy. You could wear it with black slacks and dress it up or wear it with jeans and boots and dress it down. My one and only complaint about the sweater and the only reason I gave it only three stars was because the shoulder seams are sewn inside out. I know that is the style with a lot of garments these days, and if the entire sweater had been made that way, it would kind of make sense, but as it is, it is just the shoulder seams. I am including a photo of that as well. It is such a classy looking sweater the inside out seam does not look good. I still kept it and I still wear it because I like the colors and I feel so much. I also did not return the medium that I ordered, because my daughter loved it as well so I gave it to her. But if you were going to use popular Burberry colors together, make the garment classy by sewing the seams properly. Read more
items.author: Scuppy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars looks rich
items.body: Reallllly cute and great quality --flattering ---- makes a great put-together outfit! - looks rich Read more
items.author: SallyStella

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Color Khaki, Color Gray, A Color Beige, A Stripe White, Pure Pink, A Color Green, Double Khaki, Colorful Black, Pure Black, Line Khaki, Pure Apricot, Pure Green, A Stripe Apricot, Color Pumpkin. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
